channel.title: Finance on Relentless Optimizer
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on Relentless Optimizer

item.title: Frugal Tip: Starbucks Cold Brew Refills
item.description: I’ve been a fan of the Starbucks Vanilla Sweet Cream cold brew since it came out, and a lover of cold brew coffee since the days before Seattle’s Best Coffee disappeared.

item.title: How We Budget
item.description: When we got our first real jobs, we put our paychecks into our checking account and bought everything from there. It couldn’t be easier, and I’m sure many people do the same thing.
